title: Atlassian
description: MCP Atlassian is a Model Context Protocol server for integrating with Atlassian Cloud products such as Confluence and Jira, providing tools for searching, accessing, and managing content and issues.
creator: sooperset

CONFLUENCE_URL.description: The base URL of your Confluence instance (e.g., 'https://your-domain.atlassian.net/wiki').

CONFLUENCE_USERNAME.description: Your Confluence username or email address used for authentication.

CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN.description: The API token for accessing Confluence.

JIRA_URL.description: The base URL of your Jira instance (e.g., 'https://your-domain.atlassian.net').

JIRA_USERNAME.description: Your Jira username or email address used for authentication.

JIRA_API_TOKEN.description: The API token for accessing Jira.
